text: I loved this whole section of the game. I've always had something for halloween/horror themed sections in non-horror games. Any other examples come to mind? The haunted house in Super Mario 64 immediately does to me.

text:
The Subcon Forest in A Hat in Time is a nice spooky place, and Queen Vanessa's Manor chapter was terrifying ^^'
In case you haven't played this game yet, I suggest you listen to its soundtrack, I really like it and I think some of it could make it to your list ;)
"A Forsaken Place" or "Your Contract Has Expired" are good ones from the Subcon Forest

text: Always great to see some Banjo-Kazooie love. Here’s hoping we see a full remake/sequel in the near future, along with a Yooka-Laylee that nails the collectathon gameplay.
author: Michael Cockrum

text: I still have yet to play Yooka-Laylee, what was the problem with its collectathon gameplay?
author: SupraDarky

text: I haven’t actually played it myself, but I’ve heard that its massive worlds can be a bit of a chore to navigate. I’m the kind of guy who prefers the streamlined stages of Kazooie over the massive breath of Tooie, so I’ll admit that put me off a little. That being said, I’m still interested in trying it out when the money’s right and I’ve finished the Impossible Lair (which is fantastic, btw).
author: Michael Cockrum

text: @Michael Cockrum I keep hearing Impossible Lair is a huge step up from the original YL so...can't wait to play it.
author: greenyxi

text: @greenyxi It's fantastic, dude. The levels are all very tightly designed and unique, and the overworld... At times, I feel like I've spent more time exploring it than the actual stages (and that's a good thing).
author: Michael Cockrum

text: @Michael Cockrum Glad to hear it :). Are the stages really long or?
author: greenyxi

text: @greenyxi They're a good length. Comparable to DKC I'd say.
author: Michael Cockrum

text: @Michael Cockrum I can handle that :). It's a bit of a risk me buying it since the first game is, well, a little bit wonky to put it nicely.
author: greenyxi
